artist: Artist: Gilbert & George (Gilbert Prousch & George Passmore)
description: blue folder containing thirty loose book pages with text juxtaposed with black-and-white images of line drawn faces; lender's archive #224
life_date: British, born  Italy 1943 & British, born 1942, resp.
medium: Lithographic illustrations, letterpress; loose book pages
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Printer's proof of "The World of Gilbert and George: The Storyboard"
